name: Yoink!
description:
you are a greedy pig that want to steal all the treasure in this museum, only problem is as soon as you try to steal anything all the guards are alerted, this means you have to be fast when you steal, but you can take your time and explore the building before starting, make your own route through the museum but when you steal, steal fast.

to finish the game all you have to do is have stolen something and run to the exit, this means you can finish the game by picking up one item in the first room and running straight to the exit, but that won't get you the high score.

all sleeping guards can be walked over and certain guards will be blocking areas if you steal too early.

hope you enjoyed this game, i made one for the game jam last year but wasn't able to submit it as i was coding on the free version of game maker, so this is my first submitted game.

can't wait until next year :)
